title: Software Developer
bio: Building exceptional web experiences with modern technologies. Transforming ideas into elegant, performant applications.
bioImpersonal: Hi, I'm Julian, Software Developer focused on modern web applications. Experienced in structuring scalable frontend ar-chitectures, from modular monoliths to micro-frontend setups, and in applying SSG and SSR to balance perfor-mance, personalization and dynamic content. Experienced in integrating self-hosted AI services such as OpenAI Whisper and Ollama, and supporting reliable delivery through CI/CD pipelines and cloud-based deployments. Strong emphasis on user-centric design, real-time features, and clean, maintainable code.
